Title: Live and Let Die
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Ashley Lyle, Bart Nickerson, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Davina takes Mikael to a cabin to heal from his wolf bites. Klaus searches for them. Elijah, Marcel and Hayley try to rescue some young wolves.
